entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 30 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 10 March 2023
